title: BRIEF-Ralph Lauren Expects Charge Of About $50 Million During Q4 Of 2018
text:
February 8, 2018 / 1:56 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Ralph Lauren Expects Charge Of About $50 Million During Q4 Of 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Ralph Lauren Corp: 
* RALPH LAUREN-EXPECTS CHARGE OF ABOUT $50 MILLION DURING Q4 OF 2018 AND ABOUT $75-$85 MILLION DURING FISCAL 2019 IN RELATION TO 'WAY FORWARD PLAN' - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2GW0UIy ) Further company coverage:
